_sText:
Surf_10x_reloaded_fix
Remake of surf_10x_final by Buck Nasty
---------------------

Before you flame me, I initially had permission from Wof- to remake his map.
---------------------

This map was originally started by Assaulted Combat in the late summer of '06. He disappeared and I took over. With what he left to me, I had to basically recreate everything except the ramps; Which I will give credit to him for.

- Changes:
- added ammo to all guns
- added a block bullets brush at spawn to prevent spawn killing
- added a wall to prevent people from taking a short cut to jail
Basically, all in all this map had to be remade. There are way too many changes to list. You should download the map and test it out, I guarantee that you will be pleased.

- Credits:
- Original creator of surf_10x_final: Wof-
- Assaulted Combat: who started this reload last year.
---------------------
FIX UPDATES:
- Fixed the glass wall at spawn, players were able to shoot through it
- Opened up the map so the main area is in one open skybox
- Other small things


Enjoy!
-- Buck Nasty

http://solidsurf.info/
http://www.bucknastysurf.ner/
